title: Gender Equality
caption: Go deeper about explicit and implicit gender bias, catcalling, domestic violence and much more through videos, articles and tests.
description: Gender inequality is an issue that needs to be addressed in all its manifestations. In this course we tried to present briefly the current situation and different points of view on the topic. Learn how to act in daily situations of gender discrimination and encourage others to do the same. Remember: itâ€™s important to educate ourselves about such complex problems in order to understand them and fight them. Share this course if you find it useful!
